mil.nga.giat.geowave.index.dimension

Interface NumericDimensionDefinition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DimensionField<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayField, BasicDimensionDefinition, LatitudeDefinition, LatitudeField, LongitudeDefinition, LongitudeField, SFCDimensionDefinition, SpatialArrayField, SpatialField, TimeArrayField, TimeDefinition, TimeField, UnboundedDimensionDefinition

    public interface NumericDimensionDefinition
extends Persistable
    The Numeric Dimension Definition interface defines the attributes and methods of a class which forms the Space Filling Curve dimension.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double denormalize(double value)
      Used to denormalize the numeric data set from a value between 0 and 1 scaled to fit within its native bounds
      NumericRange getBounds()
      Returns the native bounds of the dimension definition
      NumericRange getDenormalizedRange(BinRange range)
      Returns a range in the native bounds of the dimension definition, denormalized from a bin and separate range
      int getFixedBinIdSize()
      If this numeric dimension definition uses bins, it is given a fixed length for the bin ID
      NumericData getFullRange()
      Provide the entire allowed range
      BinRange[] getNormalizedRanges(NumericData range)
      Returns the set of normalized ranges
      double getRange() 
      double normalize(double value)
      Used to normalize a value within the bounds of the range to a percentage of the range between 0 and 1

      • Methods inherited from interface mil.nga.giat.geowave.index.Persistable

        fromBinary, toBinary

      • getDenormalizedRange

        NumericRange getDenormalizedRange(BinRange range)
        Returns a range in the native bounds of the dimension definition, denormalized from a bin and separate range
        Parameters:
        range - a numeric range of the data set, with a bin
        Returns:
        a NumericRange representing the given bin and range

      • getFixedBinIdSize

        If this numeric dimension definition uses bins, it is given a fixed length for the bin ID
        Returns:

        Returns the native bounds of the dimension definition
        Returns:
